# Business Context (for LLM understanding)

## About Diamond Corp.
Diamond Corp. is a business in the diamonds and precious stones industry.

## Target Audience
- High Net-Worth Individuals
- Luxury Jewelry Retailers
- Bridal Jewelry Designers
- Investment Firm Collectors
- Celebrity Stylists

## Industry
diamonds and precious stones
